results.name: Number of independent vertex sets and vertex covers in the n-antiprism graph.
comment: Sequence extrapolated to n=0 using recurrence.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500

Haoliang Wang, Robert Simon, The Analysis of Synchronous All-to-All Communication Protocols for Wireless Systems, Q2SWinet'18: Proceedings of the 14th ACM International Symposium on QoS and Security for Wireless and Mobile Networks (2018), 39-48.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Antiprism Graph

Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Vertex Cover
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,2,1).
formula: a(n) = n*Sum_{k=1..n} C(2*k,n-k)/k, a(0)=3. - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Jun 13 2020
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(- 2 x^2 - 2 x + 3) / (- x^3 - 2 x^2 - x + 1), {x, 0, 40}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 16 2017 *)
program: (MAGMA) I:=[3,1,5]; [n le 3 select I[n] else Self(n-1)+2*Self(n-2)+Self(n-3): n in [1..33]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 16 2017
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, May 15 2017
